org.objectstyle.cayenne.conn
Interface ConnectionEventLoggingDelegate

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConnectionEventLogger, ConnectionLogger
public interface ConnectionEventLoggingDelegate

A callback API to used by DriverDataSource and PoolManager to notify of connection events. Used mainly for logging.

Author:
Andrus Adamchik
